participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, Arjun often finds himself torn between his traditional upbringing and his free-spirited nature.
participant_1.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Sofia enjoys exploring new cultures and cuisines, although she struggles with cooking.
participant_2.background: i've been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i am 23 and i love food.
